page.title: 16The Post Office
page.content: The Post Office building is about 200 years old. The Post Office used to be a house. Before this the Post Office was at the house next to the shop and before that the Post Office was at Lion Cottage. There is one person who works in the Post Office, that is Mrs Cross. It opens at 9 am till 12.30 pm,then 1.30 pm to 5.30 pm. Half day is on Wednesdays till 12.30 pm. Thursday is the busiest day of the week because it is pensions day. If there was no Post Office in Welshampton people would need to go to Ellesmere but there is no bus service to Ellesmere on Thursdays. There has been a Post Office in Welshampton for 131 years.
